item.title: 传统经济类股票眼下表现相当不错
item.description:
随着投资者逃离人工智能带来的颠覆性影响，一篮子资本密集型股票正强势反弹。

【原文：

A basket of capital-intensive stocks is rallying as investors flee AI disruption.

】

item.title: 塔塔推迟董事长连任投票，权力角逐显露端倪
item.description: 知情人士透露，塔塔集团董事会推迟了关于是否批准董事长纳塔拉詹·钱德拉塞卡兰连任第三届的决定。这最新动向表明，这家印度最古老的综合企业集团可能正酝酿新一轮领导权之争。【原文：The board of Tata Sons Pvt. deferred a decision on granting a third term to Chairman Natarajan Chandrasekaran, people familiar said, in the latest sign that another leadership tussle could be brewing at India’s oldest conglomerate.】

item.title: 美国紫薯热潮正挤压菲律宾供应链
item.description:
紫薯作为菲律宾菜肴的经典食材，如今已遍布全球菜单，而农民们正竭力满足市场需求。

【原文：

Long a staple of Filipino cuisine, the purple yam is all over global menus, and farmers are struggling to keep up.

】

item.title: 肉类零食制造商Archer获1亿美元贷款，女性消费者需求持续增长
item.description: 阿彻肉类零食公司从摩根大通公司获得了近1亿美元的信贷额度，这使其能够在高蛋白零食需求激增之际扩大生产——尤其受到女性消费者的青睐。【原文：Archer Meat Snacks secured a credit facility for nearly $100 million from JPMorgan Chase & Co., allowing it to ramp up production as demand surges for its high-protein snacks — particularly among women.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚力推圭亚那增长，角逐下个十年的油田
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司正押注其在圭亚那的重大发现所引发的经济繁荣，将使公司在与其他寻求开发本国油气储备的国家谈判财政条款时占据优势。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is betting the economic boom unleashed by its giant discovery in Guyana will give the company an edge when negotiating fiscal terms with other nations looking to develop their own oil and gas reserves.】

item.title: 苹果将推出美国制造的Mac mini，作为特朗普政府推动消费计划的一部分
item.description: 苹果公司周二宣布，将于今年晚些时候在休斯顿启动Mac mini台式电脑的生产，此举是该公司推动在美国增加制造业产量的举措之一。【原文：Apple Inc. on Tuesday said it will start building Mac mini desktop computers in Houston later this year, part of a push to do more manufacturing in the US.】

item.title: 贝莱德领投荷兰芯片制造商Axelera AI 2.5亿美元融资轮
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商Axelera AI从包括贝莱德公司在内的投资者处筹集了超过2.5亿美元资金，用于开发高效能半导体芯片。这些芯片专为运行经过训练的人工智能模型而设计。【原文：Dutch chipmaker Axelera AI raised more than $250 million from investors including BlackRock Inc. to make power-efficient semiconductors that are designed to run artificial intelligence models after they’ve been trained.】

item.title: 特朗普宣称经济成就归功于自己，但要向民众推销这一成果面临艰巨任务
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普宣称美国经济终于属于他了。现在他必须捍卫它。【原文：Donald Trump says the US economy is finally his. Now he’ll have to defend it.】

item.title: 前道明银行交易员纳达拉贾在等待虚假报价审判期间被禁业
item.description: 多伦多道明银行和杰富瑞金融集团前高级交易员因涉嫌操纵美国国债市场而面临审判，在此期间被禁止在美国金融业从业。【原文：A former senior trader at Toronto-Dominion Bank and Jefferies Financial Group Inc. was banned from the US financial industry while he awaits trial over charges that he allegedly manipulated the market for US government bonds.】

item.title: 投资者正抛售软件股，盈利也无法阻止这一趋势
item.description: 投资者数月来持续抛售软件类股票，因担忧人工智能带来的颠覆性影响，而该板块即将公布的财报预计也难以平息市场焦虑。【原文：Investors have been ditching software stocks for months on fears of disruption from artificial intelligence, and upcoming earnings from the group aren’t expected to settle any nerves.】

item.title: 印度金达尔集团筹措10亿美元贷款以提振低迷市场
item.description: 知情人士透露，印度最大企业集团之一金达尔集团的能源部门正寻求通过离岸贷款筹集高达10亿美元资金，用于海外扩张。此举为受贸易波动困扰的印度美元贷款市场带来喘息之机。【原文：The power unit of one of India’s largest conglomerates Jindal Group is seeking to raise as much as $1 billion from offshore loans to fund overseas expansion, according to people familiar with the matter, providing relief for India’s dollar loan market that’s been stymied by trade swings.】

item.title: CECO Environmental即将达成22亿美元收购Thermon的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，CECO Environmental Corp.正就收购Thermon Group Holdings Inc.进行深入谈判。随着数据中心对热管理解决方案的需求激增，这家过滤设备制造商正寻求进军该领域。【原文：CECO Environmental Corp. is in advanced talks to acquire Thermon Group Holdings Inc., as the filtration company looks to enter the thermal solutions market amid booming demand from data centers, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 库存持续减少的看涨者在悲观情绪升温中看到希望的曙光
item.description: 近四个月来，美国股市始终在历史高位附近震荡，几乎每次上涨都迅速被抛售浪潮抹去，本周一的行情便是如此。【原文：US stocks have churned near a record for nearly four months, with virtually every gain quickly wiped out by a bout of selling like Monday’s.】

item.title: 中国美格科技以地缘政治为由剥离美国子公司
item.description: 中国生物技术公司美格纳科技宣布将剥离其全资美国子公司Complete Genomics Inc，结束长达十年的美国市场扩张计划。该公司称此举是因美国政策环境日益严峻。【原文：Chinese biotechnology firm MGI Tech Co. announced it will divest its wholly-owned US subsidiary, Complete Genomics Inc, retreating from a decade-long quest to expand in the American market amid what it described as an increasingly grim policy environment.】

item.title: 高盛团队称重资产类股票因人工智能担忧表现优异
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，随着投资者寻求避开人工智能颠覆的避风港，拥有有形生产性资产的企业股票表现优于大盘。【原文：Shares in companies with tangible productive assets are outperforming as investors seek havens from artificial intelligence disruption, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 诺沃制药在华肥胖症药物中期试验取得突破性进展
item.description: 诺和诺德去年获得许可的一款实验性药物在中国中期研究中显示出显著的减肥效果，这为该公司寻找能够维持其在肥胖症市场增长的新产品提供了动力。【原文：An experimental drug Novo Nordisk licensed last year has shown notable weight loss in a mid-stage study in China, boosting the company’s search for newer products that could sustain its growth in the obesity market.】

item.title: 挪威央行料将推迟下次降息至第三季度
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家预测，挪威央行很可能在第三季度继续降息，并于2027年初结束货币宽松政策。【原文：Norges Bank will probably extend its interest-rate cuts in the third quarter and end monetary easing at the start of 2027, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 摩根大通将于6月前将阿联酋从新兴市场债券指数中剔除
item.description: 摩根大通公司表示，将在6月前将阿拉伯联合酋长国从其新兴市场债券指数中剔除，因该中东国家连续三年超过该行设定的财富标准。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. said it will remove the United Arab Emirates from its emerging-market bond indexes by June after the Middle Eastern nation exceeded the bank’s measures of wealth for three successive years.】

item.title: 欺骗航空业的假零件、假人员和假PDF文件
item.description: 在伦敦郊外一个宁静的英国村庄里，何塞·亚历杭德罗·萨莫拉·伊拉拉从自家办公室出发，耗费数年时间售出6万件喷气发动机部件。这些部件配有伪造的文件，悄无声息地渗透到全球航空业的每个角落。【原文：From his home office in a tranquil English village just outside London, Jose Alejandro Zamora Yrala spent years selling 60,000 jet-engine components with fabricated paperwork that trickled into every corner of the global aviation industry.】

item.title: 中国假日旅游热潮涌现，彰显消费信心回升
item.description: 中国游客在周一结束的年度假期中消费大幅增长，这是政府加大刺激商品和服务需求力度后，消费者信心改善的罕见迹象。【原文：Chinese travelers spent a lot more during an annual holiday that ended Monday, a rare sign of improving consumer sentiment after the government boosted efforts to spur demand for goods and services.】

item.title: 新加坡航空利润飙升26%，旅游热潮抵消成本上涨
item.description: 新加坡航空有限公司表示，第三季度营业利润跃升26%，收入创下历史新高，因旅游需求激增带来乘客数量激增。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd. said operating profit jumped 26% in the third quarter, and revenue hit a record, as booming travel demand saw bumper passenger numbers.】

item.title: 美国议员寻求终止尼日利亚伊斯兰教法，暴力事件调查仍在进行中
item.description: 美国议员就尼日利亚迫害基督徒的指控展开调查，称这个西非国家应废除伊斯兰教法和反亵渎法，以帮助遏制日益加剧的极端主义暴力。【原文：US lawmakers probing allegations of persecution of Christians in Nigeria said the West African nation should repeal Sharia and anti-blasphemy laws to help counter growing extremist violence.】

item.title: 空头再度瞄准Teleperformance，人工智能的首批受害者之一
item.description: 投机者再度加大做空呼叫中心运营商Teleperformance SE股票的力度，押注这家法国公司的业务将因人工智能工具的广泛应用而遭受进一步冲击。【原文：Speculators are again ramping up bets against call-center operator Teleperformance SE’s shares, wagering that the French company’s business will suffer further from the widespread adoption of artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 阿里尼的Lemssouguer指出，仅凭对人工智能的恐惧就可能导致软件违约风险
item.description: 阿里尼资本管理公司创始人哈姆扎·勒姆苏盖指出，对人工智能可能引发颠覆性变革的担忧，已足以推高软件企业的融资成本，给这个负债累累的行业带来困境。【原文：Fear of AI’s potential for disruption is enough to push up borrowing costs for software companies, causing problems for a sector that has a lot of debt, according to Arini Capital Management’s founder Hamza Lemssouguer.】

item.title: 非盟银行考虑推出工具，为非洲项目解锁高达4万亿美元资金
item.description: 非洲开发银行正在制定新的风险评估框架，该框架将有助于其为投资释放更多资本。【原文：The African Development Bank is working on a new risk-assessment framework that will help it unlock more capital for investments.】

item.title: 据称Sify Infinit在印度IPO中寻求42亿美元估值
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度数据中心公司Sify Infinit Spaces Ltd.计划下月进行首次公开募股（IPO），目标估值高达42亿美元。【原文：Indian data-center company Sify Infinit Spaces Ltd. is seeking a valuation of as much as $4.2 billion in a potential initial public offering next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯转向更大油轮，因其更多石油输往中国
item.description: 俄罗斯正调整其石油供应链，以应对运往中国的原油数量激增。部分油品正从小型油轮转运至大型油轮，在新的海上中转站完成装载，以应对更长的东向航程。【原文：Russia is changing its oil supply chain to cope with the growing number of barrels going to China, shifting some shipments from smaller to larger tankers at a new at-sea site for the longer voyage east.】

item.title: 债券交易恶化或将动摇北欧信贷繁荣
item.description: 一系列北欧债券交易在发行后接连暴跌，令长期投资者对这个迅速膨胀的市场声誉忧心忡忡。【原文：A succession of Nordic bond deals that sank after issuance is leading long term investors to fret about the reputation of this rapidly burgeoning market.】

item.title: Shein承诺升级中国供应链以争取北京支持
item.description: Shein计划投资逾100亿元人民币（约合14.5亿美元）强化其在华南地区的供应链体系。这家快时尚电商平台正寻求加强与北京的联系，以应对香港首次公开募股受阻及日益增大的外部压力。【原文：Shein plans to invest over 10 billion yuan ($1.45 billion) to strengthen its supply chain in Southern China, as the fast‑fashion online retailer seeks to reinforce ties with Beijing amid a stalled Hong Kong initial public offering and mounting external pressures.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在关键时刻成功购得乌干达输油管道股权
item.description: 乌干达将通过首次公开募股持有肯尼亚石油产品管道五分之一的股权，部分分析师认为该股定价过高。【原文：Uganda will own a fifth of Kenya’s oil-products pipeline through an initial public offering that some analysts have said was overpriced.】
